tag_narrative: Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls
Promote sustained, inclusive and sustainable economic growth, full and productive employment and decent work for all
Eliminate all forms of violence against all women and girls in the public and private spheres, including trafficking and sexual and other types of exploitation
By 2020, substantially reduce the proportion of youth not in employment, education or training
title_narrative: ForSUD  - multiactor approach and south-south cooperation in order to tackle the root causes of irregular migration
ForSUD - approccio multiattoriale e cooperazione sud-sud per la rimozione delle cause profonde della migrazione irregolare
sector_narrative: Women's rights organisations and movements, and government institutions
description_narrative: project aimed at tackling the root causes of irregular migration and the trafficking in human beings,  especially women and unaccompanied minors, through job creation and the promotion of human rights

iniziativa volta alla rimozione delle cause della migrazione irregolare e della tratta di esseri umani, in particolare di donne e minori non accompagnati (MNA), attraverso il lavoro e la promozione dei diritti
